member.name: P:UIelements.CancelExitButton.IsCancel
member.summary: Get/Set if the button is a Cancel button, or an Exit button.

member.name: P:UIelements.CancelExitButton.IsExit
member.summary: Get/Set if the button is a Exit button, or an Cancel button.

member.name: P:UIelements.CancelExitButton.WasCanceled
member.summary: An indication that the button was clicked on while it was a Cancel button.

member.name: T:UIelements.CancelExitButton
member.summary: This class is used to provide a Button that can be an 'Exit' or a 'Cancel' button. Also, flags are used to communicate the state of the button, and how the user has used it.

member.name: P:UIelements.ComboBoxWithMemory.ListLength
member.summary: Get/Set the length of the list as it is maintained in the application's MySettings.

member.name: P:UIelements.ComboBoxWithMemory.ShowOnlyFileName
member.summary: A flag to show that the list entry shown is a FilePathName, and should be listed as a Filename only.

member.name: M:UIelements.ComboBoxWithMemory.AddNewEntry(System.String)
member.summary: Add an entry to the list of items.
member.param: The text of the entry to add.

member.name: P:UIelements.ComboBoxWithMemory.SettingsItemList
member.summary: get/Set the list of ComboBox items using the 'System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection' class compatible with an application's saved setting. Note that the length of this list is limited.
member.value: The 'System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection' retreived from the application's MySettings.
member.returns: A 'System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection' suitable for storing in the application's MySettings.
member.remarks: The length of this list is limited by the 'ListLength' property.

member.name: T:UIelements.ComboBoxWithMemory
member.summary: This class is used to provide a ComboBox that can remember it's previously listed items.

member.name: P:UIelements.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:UIelements.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:UIelements.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
